### WON DARWEY

A Da mot de a sé e ji lagwi ,<br>
be tǝ̀  reza mo jere,<br>
segwɔm mosē vey.<br>
Pye de hwó simo be ra yɛ e jey,<br>
sede remo de be dopse ra e lagwi.<br>
Nɔ́ng ot yunung pyɛ́ mot yê kahɛ́ tuk.<br>
Hala a wot banen mot,<br>
sede remo de wot a hala a vemo de ba ra a wot banen.<br>
Hwo wɔ na wot e kwɔ̂n setɔgɔs wɛt,<br>
ko hwo sey ot yi e vwɔ̂ wo neves.<br>
Yaga segwɔm,<br>
na reto,<br>
na nerey,<br>
yen a sé bemo,<br>
gbak jey.<br>
Ano.

### THE LORD'S PRAYER

Our Father,<br>
who art in heaven,<br>
hallowed be your name.<br>
Your kingdom come,<br>
your will be done on earth,<br>
as it is in heaven.<br>
Give us this day,<br>
our daily bread.<br>
And forgive us our trespasses,<br>
as we also forgive those who sin against us.<br>
Lead us not into temptation but deliver us from evil.<br>
For yours is the kingdom,<br>
the power and the glory,<br>
forever and ever,<br>
Amen.
